                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Density estimation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Get an explicit estimate of the unknown probability distribution that generated the training data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Generate new data by sampling from the estimated distribution
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Detect anomalies/novelties in terms of data points that a exhibit low probabilities

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Autoencoders

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      extraction of smaller set of meaningful features

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Autoencoders

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Autoencoder: unsupervised method for learning a lower-dimensional feature representation from unlabeled training data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Used for dimensionality reduction
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Autoencoding: encoding itself

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Encoding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Features in z should capture meaningful factors of variation in data x
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • z is smaller than x

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Decoding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Decoder mirrors the behaviour of the encoder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Uses up-convolutional layers, reciprocal of the convolutional ones
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Reconstruction loss: Np-loss between the original x and the reconstructed x^
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • After training decoder is no more necessary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Classification

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Encoded features can be used to initialize a supervised model

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Principal components

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      drop dimension
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      of least variance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Main idea

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. Find orthogonal directions of maximum variance
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. Change coordinate system
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      3. Drop dimensions of least variance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Example: reduce from 3D to 2D

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      find variance of centered data points along a direction w

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Variance along unit direction w

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Given (in an n-dimensional space)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Training set containing points xi
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Auxiliary point c
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Unit direction: vector w starting in c s.t. wTw=1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Let

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Projection ti of vector xi−c on vector w

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ti=(xi−c)Tw

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Set t of projections

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          t={ti : ti=(xi−c)Tw, ∀xi∈D}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Vector X¯ of distances of points from mean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          X¯=[x¯1, x¯1, ..., x¯n]where  x¯i=xi−x¯
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Centering data points

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Calculate: expectation and variance of set of vectors t

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        E[t] = 1n∑i=1nti= 1n∑i=1n(xi−c)Tw= x¯Tw−cTw Var[t] = 1n∑i=1n(ti−E[t])2== 1n∑i=1n((xi−x¯)Tw)2== 1n∑i=1n(x¯iTw)2== wT[1nX¯X¯T]w== wTCw
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Where: C=[1nX¯X¯T] is the covariance matrix of the centered data set
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Note: variance doesn’t use c

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: find vector w that maximize the variance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        w∈argmaxw{wTCw : wTw=1}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      covariance: measure of the joint variability of two random variables

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Recap – Covariance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Variance and covariance: measure of the spread of a set of points around their center of mass (mean)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Variance: measure of the deviation from the mean for points in one dimension

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Covariance: measure of how much each of the dimensions vary from the mean w.r.t. the other

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Measured between two dimensions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Sees if there is a relation between two dimensions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Measure how spread out the data are in any given direction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Definition (Covariance matrix C along n dimensions)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Square matrix containing variances and covariances of data points along each pair of the n dimensions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      C∈ℝn×n : Cij={var(i)i=jcov(i,j)i≠j

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      linked vector x and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      scalar λ s.t. Ax = λx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Eigenvalues & Eigenvectors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Definition (Eigenvalues & Eigenvectors)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Eigenvalue and eigenvectors of a square matrix A are linked in order to satisfy the condition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Ax=λx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • A∈ℝm×m: square matrix
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • x∈ℝm: eigenvector or characteristic vector
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • λ∈ℝ: eigenvalue or characteristic value
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • I∈ℝm×m: identity matrix (below)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ax=λx∈ℝm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      decompose A in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      term of its eigs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Eigenvalue Decomposition (ED)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Procedure (Eigenvalue Decomposition)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Given: symmetric matrix A∈ℝm×m

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: decompose A in UΛUT, so that it’s written in terms of its eigs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ∃U=[u1,...,um]∈ℝm×m,  Λ=(λ1,...,λm)∈ℝm:λ1≥⋯≥λms.t.A=UΛUT=∑j=1mλjujujT  ∧  UTU=UUT=I

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Where

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • I: identity matrix
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • uj: eigenvector
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • λj: corresponding eigenvalue
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • U: matrix containing eigenvectors in columns
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Λ: diagonal matrix of eigenvalues
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        U=[u1⋯un]Λ=[λ1⋯0⋮⋱⋮0⋯λn]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      decomposition for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      generic matrices

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Singular Value Decomposition (SVD)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Procedure (Singular Value Decomposition)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Given: A∈Rm×n

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: decompose generic matrix A in UsVT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ∃U∈Rm×k,  s∈Rk:s1≥⋯≥sk≥0,  V∈Rn×ks.t.A=UsVT ∧ UTU=VTV=I

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Where

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • I: identity matrix
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • U: matrix containing eigenvectors in columns
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • s: diagonal matrix of eigenvalues
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        U=[u1⋯un]s=[s1⋯0⋮⋱⋮0⋯sn]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      find the PCs w that maximize the variance by eigenvalue decomposition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Principal Components

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Definition (First Principal Component)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      w1∈argmaxw{wTCw⏟variance along w : wTw=1}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Solution: indirectly by eigenvalue decomposition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The variance along the FPC is the largest eigenvalue of C
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The FPC w1 is the corresponding eigenvector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Definition (Second Principal Component)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      w2∈argmaxw{wTCw : wTw=1 ∧ w⊥w1}
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Variance along the SPC: second largest eigenvalue of C
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • SPC w2: corresponding eigenvector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Definition (i-th Principal Component)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      wi∈argmaxw{wTCw : wTw=1 ∧ w⊥wj, ∀ 1≤j<i}
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Variance along the i-PC: i-th largest eigenvalue of C
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • i-PC wi: corresponding eigenvector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      lines with minimal
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      square loss

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Alternative Interpretation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • The PCs can be interpreted as the lines in space with minimal squared distance from the data points

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Principal Component Analysis

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      output: PCs and variances

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      PCA algorithms

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Using ED

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Using SVD

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      change coordinate system to first k PC with ED or SVD

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Dimensionality reduction using PCA

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: extract the first k principal components

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Let: W^=[w1,...,wk] holds the first k PCs derived from centered data points X¯=[x¯1,...,x¯n]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Change to reduced coordinate system with the k PCs as axis

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        T=W^TX¯∈Rk×n

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • T: principal component scores

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Use ED or SVD algorithms

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Advantage: since they are iterative processes, they avoid computing the full decomposition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Note: PCA with dimensions dropped can be seen as a linear encoder preserving maximum variance in data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      scale features to have
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      unit standard deviation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scaling of variables

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • The scale of the feature dimensions matters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • If features are expressed in different units it is recommended to scale them to have unit standard deviation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. data centering
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. covariance matrix C
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      3. eigenvs of C
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      4. feature vector
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      5. reduce dimensions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. Data centering: origin in the mean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. Compute: covariance matrix C

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        C=[ 0.6160.615  0.6150.716 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Since the non-diagonal elements in C are positive, both the x and y variable increase together

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      3. Calculate: eigs of C

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        U=[−0.735−0.677    0.677−0.735 ][ λ1  λ2 ]=[ 0.04   1.28 ]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Eigenvectors are plotted as diagonal dotted lines (they are perpendicular to each other)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      4. In order to form a feature vector we can either

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • use both of the eigenvectors
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • leave out the smaller, less significant component and only have a single column in U

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Derive new data coordinates multiplying the matrix with the eigenvectors in the columns transposed and the matrix of the centered data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      5. Reduce the dimensions (and restore data)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      cumulative proportion
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      of explained variance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Number of principal components

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • The number of components for dimensionality reduction depends on goal and application
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Information loss increases in the number of dropped dimensions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • No means of validating it, unless we use it in the context of a supervised method
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • e.g. Reduce the input dimensionality for a supervised algorithm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Formula (Cumulative proportion of explained variance)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Task: reduce dimensions from n to k

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: estimate the amount of information loss

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Formula (FPC, ED)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Compute the cumulative variance explained by the first k eigenvalues/variances ∑j=1kλj
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Normalize the cumulative variance dividing it by the sum of all the variances ∑j=1mCjj
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ∑j=1kλj∑j=1mCjj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Formula (FPC, SVD)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ∑j=1ksj2∑ijX¯ij2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Higher values of the cumulative proportion means that the lower dimensional representation explains well the variation/distribution of the training data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      combine kernel trick + PCA

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Kernel PCA (KPCA)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • PCA reduces the dimensionality via a linear transformation/mapping

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Autoencoders instead can perform non-linear trasformations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Use kernel trick

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Apply PCA in a higher dimensional space
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Yield a non-linear transformation in the original space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Other techniques
