                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. update cluster centers
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      - weighted contribution
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      from points
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      - fit gaussian with MLE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      EM algorithm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. Initially: start with some initial cluster centers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. Iterate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Soft assign points to each cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Calculate: probability p(θc|x) of each point to belong to each cluster
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • θc: set of parameters associated to a certain cluster (i.e. mean vector and covariance matrix)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Plug into the probability the gaussian equation for each cluster
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Normalized to make a probability

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Recalculate: cluster centers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Calculate: new cluster parameters θc
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Cluster centers get a weighted contribution from points
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Fit a gaussian: use Maximum Likelihood Estimation (MLE)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      expected belonging probabilities p(θ_c | x); estimate new model θ_c

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      EM explained

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Expectation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Given: current model
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Objective: calculate the expected probabilities p(θc|x) of the data points to belong to each cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Maximization

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Given: probabilistic assignment of all the points
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Objective: estimate a new model θc (MLE)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Summary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Similar to k-means

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Each iterations increases the likelihood of the data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Is guaranteed to converge

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Though to a local optimum

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • General purpose approach for training a model without labels

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Not just for clustering
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Instead: k-means is just for clustering

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Spectral clustering

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Non-Gaussian data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      groups based on
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      links in a graph

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Spectral clustering

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Local reasoning: considers the inter-distances between points
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Group points based on links in a graph

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      fully connected or kNN; similarity among nodes (gaussian kernel)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Create a graph

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Options

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Fully connected graph

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • kNN graph

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Each node is only connected to its k closest neighbors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Use some notion of similarity among nodes for computing the distances

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • It is common to use a gaussian kernel to compute a similarity matrix
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      W(i,j)=exp⁡−|xi−xj|2σ2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      similarity matrix

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Graph partitioning

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Define: similarity matrix
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Cut the graph

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      degree of node
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      volume of set

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Graph terminology

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Degree of a node

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        di=∑jwi,j

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Volume of a set

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        vol(A)=∑i∈AdiA⊆V

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      minimize the cut

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Graph cut

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Consider: partition of the graph into two parts A and B
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Cut(A,B): sum of the weights of the set of edges that connect the two groups
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Goal: find the partition that minimizes the cut

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      minimize NCut; generalized eigenvalue problem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Normalized cut

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: minimize

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        NCut(A,B)=Cut(A,B)V(A)+Cut(A,B)V(B)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • This problem can

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. be formalized as a discrete optimization problem
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. be relaxed in the continuous domain
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. become a generalized eigenvalue problem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Hierarchical clustering

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      nested cluster as a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      hier. tree (dendrogram)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Dendrogram

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Output: set of nested clusters organized as a hierarchical tree (dendrogram)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Application: gene profiles

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      incrementally merge closest clusters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Agglomerative clustering

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Idea

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Merge very similar instances
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Incrementally build larger clusters out of smaller clusters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Algorithm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Initially: each instance in its own cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Repeat

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Pick the two closest clusters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Merge them into a new cluster
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Stop when there is only one cluster left

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Output: family of clusters represented by a dendrogram

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      closest, farest, average

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Clusters distance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Define: distance for clusters with multiple elements

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Closest pair
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Farthest pair
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Average among all distances

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      17. Deep Generative Models

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Introduction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      generative: Y → X
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      discriminative: X → Y

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Discriminative VS Generative model

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Discriminative models: statistical models of the conditional distribution pY|X of the target given the input

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Generative models: statistical models of data distribution pX or pXY depending on availability of target data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • A discriminative model can be constructed from a generative model via Bayes rule but not viceversa
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      pY|X(Y|X)=pXY(x,y)∑y′pXY(x,y′)=pXY(x,y)PX(x)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Density estimation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      find probability distribution f∈Δ(Z)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      fitting p_data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Explicit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Objective

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Find: probability distribution f∈Δ(Z) that fits an unknown data distribution pdata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Δ(Z): set of all the possible probability distributions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Where: z∈Z is sampled from pdata∈Δ(Z)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Supervised learning: Z=X×Y
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Unupervised learning: Z=X

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Assumption (for this lecture): Z=X

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Application: VAE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      find mapping function f∈Z^Ω generating f(ω)∈Z

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Implicit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Objective

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Find: mapping function f∈ZΩ that generates data f(ω)∈Z
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Such that: the distribution of generated samples fits the unknown data distribution pdata∈Δ(Z)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Input: ω sampled from some predefined distribution pω∈Δ(Ω)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Application: GAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      q* ∈ arg min_{q∈H} d(p_data, q)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Objective

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Define: hypothesis space H⊂Δ(Z) of models that can represent probability distributions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Implicitly or explicitly

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Define: divergence measure d∈ℝΔ(Z)×Δ(Z) between probability distributions in Δ(Z)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Find: hypothesis q∗∈H that best fits the data distributed according to pdata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The best fit is measured using the divergence d
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      q∗∈argminq∈Hd(pdata,q)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Variational AutoEncoders (VAE)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      probabilistic spin to AE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Variational AutoEncoders

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Variational AutoEncoders: generative model used for density estimation and for generating data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Idea: add a probabilistic spin to traditional autoencoders
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Exam: difference and applications of AE and VAE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      compress high-dimensional data, minimize divergence

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Recap – Autoencoders

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: dimensionality reduction, compress high-dimensional data to a lower dimensional representation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective (encoder): maps input data to a compressed representation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Output: compressed representation ω preserving meaningful factors of variations in the data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Training (encoder)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Leverage a decoder mapping the representation back to the input domain
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Output: x^≈x (reconstruction)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The encoder autoencodes its input

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective (training): minimize the divergence between input and its reconstruction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • After training the decoder is not needed anymore, since it was only functional to estimating the encoder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      encoder: initialize features for supervised
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      decoder: generate new data from ω

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Usage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Usage (encoder): initialize or precompute features for supervised models

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Usage (decoder): generate new data from latent space Ω

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • It does not generate data according to the data distribution pdata
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Used in VAE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      p(ω) --decoder-> p_data(x)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Decoding data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Given

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Simple prior distribution pω (e.g. gaussian)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Sample ω from pω

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objectives

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • If ω is sampled from an area of high likelihood w.r.t. pω, the decoder should map in with high probability to an area of high likelihood w.r.t. pdata
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Opposite for low probability

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      find the best parameters θ to marginalize the distribution q_θ(x)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Decoder objective

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Decoder qθ(x|ω): NN that computes a conditional probability distribution given the latent code ω

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      qθ(x)=𝔼ω∼pω[qθ(x|ω)]θ∗∈argminθ∈ΘdKL(qθ,pdata)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objectives

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Marginalize a marginal distribution qθ(x) w.r.t. all the possible latent codes ω
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Find: optimal q∗ through finding the optimal parameters θ∈Θ of the NN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Formula (Kullback-Leibler divergence)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      dKL(p,q)=𝔼x∼p[log⁡p(x)q(x)]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      use an encoder
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      q_ψ(ω|x) as a regularizer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Intractable objective
