                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      dKL(pdata ,qθ)=Ex∼pdata [log⁡pdata (x)qθ(x)]=−Ex∼pdata [log⁡qθ(x)]+const=−Ex∼pdata [log⁡Eω∼pω[qθ(x|ω)]⏟intractable]+const

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Problem: marginalize over latent space is an intractable optimization problem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Solution: introduce an auxiliary NN qψ that is an encoder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Let: qψ(ω|x)∈Δ(Ω) denotes an encoding probability distribution

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Models a conditional probability distribution, from given data x to latent code ω
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • ψ : other parameters
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Apply Jensen’s inequality
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      log⁡Eω∼pω[qθ(x|ω)]=log⁡Eω∼qψ(⋅|x)[qθ(x|ω)pω(ω)qψ(ω|x)]≥Eω∼qψ(⋅|x)[log⁡(qθ(x|ω)pω(ω)qψ(ω|x))]=Eω∼qψ(⋅|x)[log⁡qθ(x|ω)]⏟reconstruction−dKL(qψ(⋅|x),pω)⏟regularizer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Reconstruction term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Effect of marginalizing over the latent code
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Depends only on the parameters θ of the decoder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Regularizer term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • qψ computes a distribution similar to pω (taken as a gaussian)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Depends only on the parameters ψ of the encoder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Result: given the latent code allows to reconstruct the data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      upper bound to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      KL-divergence

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Variational bound

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: minimize the expectation over x∼pdata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • It gives an upper bound to the problem
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      dKL(pdata,qθ)≤Ex∼pdata[−Eω∼qψ(⋅|x)[log⁡qθ(x|ω)]+dKL(qψ(⋅|x),pω)]+const

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. encode x ∈ X → ω ∈ Ω 2. decode ω ∈ Ω → x' ∈ X

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Training in practice

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Given original data x∈X, the encoder qψ maps x to ω∈Ω in the latent space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Returns: mean and covariance of ω|x
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Regularization term ensures that mapping is consistent with shape of prior (gaussian)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. The decoder qθ does the opposite operation from latent space back to data space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Returns: mean and covariance of x|ω

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Notes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • NN parameters θ and ψ are jointly trained
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Sample from pdata is a minibatch
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Training requires sampling from the gaussian

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      only use the decoder on the generated prior distribution

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Generating data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      objective: continuos well distributed latent space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Examples of learned latent space on MNIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Only reconstruction loss

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Generates clusters of latent code
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Huge discontinuity
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Similar to regular autoencoders

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Only regularization loss

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Generates good data distribution in space, but unstructured

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Full variational lower bound loss

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Latent space is well behaved
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Nearby codes corresponds to similar images
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Latent space is continuous

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      q_ψ(ω|x,y) and q_θ(x|ω,y) to generate data conditioned on side information

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Conditional VAE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Given: side information y∈Y

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • e.g. Labels, attributes, etc.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: generate new data conditioned on the side information

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • e.g. Generate digit 7, generate a face with glasses, etc.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Modifications

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Encoder and decoder take the side information in input obtaining qψ(ω|x,y) and qθ(x|ω,y)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Spaces: X×Y→Ω×Y→X

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Define: prior conditioned on side information pω(ω|y)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      underfitting: strong regularizer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      blurry samples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Issues with VAE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Underfitting: at initial stages the regularizer is too strong and tends to annihilate the model capacity
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Blurry samples: the generator tends to produce blurry data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      estimate implicit densities with generator g_θ and q_θ; find θ* s.t. q_θ* minimize divergence from p_data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Generative Adversarial Networks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Goal: estimate implicit densities

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Idea

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1. Sample from a (simple, gaussian) probability distribution
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Generate complex data with a huge NN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Given: prior density pω∈Δ(Ω)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Learn

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Generator/Decoder gθ∈XΩ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Parametrized NN that maps codes from the latent space Ω to the complex domain X

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Distribution qθ∈Δ(Z)X

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          qθ(x)=𝔼ω∼pωδ[gθ(ω)−x]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Returns: density induced by the prior pω and the generator gθ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • δ: Dirac delta function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: find θ∗ such that qθ∗ best fits the data distribution pdata under the Jensen-Shannon divergence

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        θ∗∈argminθdJS(pdata,qθ)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Problem: intractable to optimize directly
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Same holds for the gradients

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Formula (Jensen-Shannon divergence)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      dJS(p,q)=12dKL(p,p+q2)+12dKL(q,p+q2)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Symmetrize KL divergence

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      discriminator NN t predicting if x
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      belongs to p or q

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equivalent form of the JS divergence

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Solution: introduce a discriminant NN t to act as a binary classifier predicting if x comes from p or q, s.t.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        t(x)=p(x)p(x)+q(x)∧1−t(x)=q(x)p(x)+q(x) 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      dJS(p,q)=12dKL(p,p+q2)+12dKL(q,p+q2)=12Ex∼p[log⁡2p(x)p(x)+q(x)]+12Ex∼q[log⁡2q(x)p(x)+q(x)]=12Ex∼p[log⁡p(x)p(x)+q(x)]+12Ex∼q[log⁡q(x)p(x)+q(x)]+log⁡(2)=log⁡(2)+12maxt{Ex∼p[log⁡t(x)]+Ex∼q[log⁡(1−t(x))]}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      minimize d_JS lower bound to obtain generator's parameters θ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      GAN objective

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Let: tφ(x) be a classifier/discriminator for data points in the training set

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Get: lower bound on the objective

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        dJS(pdata, qθ) = log⁡(2)+12maxt{Ex∼pdata[log⁡t(x)]+Ex∼qθ[log⁡(1−t(x))]}≥ log⁡(2)+12max{Ex∼pdata[log⁡tφ(x)]+Ex∼qθ[log⁡(1−tφ(x))]}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Which is minimized to obtain the generator’s parameters θ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          θ∗∈ argminθmaxφ{Ex∼pdata[log⁡tφ(x)]+Ex∼qθ[log⁡(1−tφ(x))]}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Issue: still depends on the explicit density, we cannot sample x from distribution qθ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Solution: sample ω from prior pω and get x throught the generator gθ(ω)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Ex∼qθ[log⁡(1−tφ(x))] = Eω∼pω[log⁡(1−tφ(gθ(ω)))]θ∗∈ argminθmaxφ{Ex∼pdata[log⁡tφ(x)]⏟minimize classification error+ Eω∼pω[log⁡(1−tφ(gθ(ω)))]⏟minimize distinguishability}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Solved with

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Gradient descent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Specialized approaches for handling the min-max problem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      generate non distinguishable data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      from true data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Paragon

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Two-players, zero-sum, non-cooperative game

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Player 1 (generator): tries to generate data that can not be distinguished from the true data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Player 2 (discriminator): tries to guess whether the input comes from the true distribution or it is fake

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      train g_θ to generate indistinguishable data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      and t_φ to minimize the classification error

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Training in practice

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. Get data, sampling mini-batches

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Real data: x∼pdata
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Synthetic data: x^=gθ(ω∼pω)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. Apply a random switch to select real or synthetic data

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      3. Use the discriminator tφ to recognise is data is generated or taken from training set

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      4. Train, using the loss between x and x^ and the classification error jointly

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • gθ to better generate indistinguishable synthetic data
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • tφ to minimize the classification error

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      only generator needed

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Test time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Discriminator is no longer necessary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      x^ = g_θ(Σ s_i·ω_μi)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      s_i = {1,-1}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Interpolation in the latent space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Arithmetic in latent space

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      - training stability
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      - mode collapse
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      - vanishing gradient

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Issues with GANs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Training stability: parameters might oscillate and never converge

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • GANs involve solving an optimization problem w.r.t. weights of two opponent NN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Mode collapse: generator learn to perfectly generate few examples / specific patterns from training set

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Vanishing gradient: if discriminator is very successful it leaves the generator with little gradient to learn from

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Performance measurement

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      combinations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Several GANs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • More GAN-like models can be constructed by considering different divergences between probabilities
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • GANs build on Bergman divergences
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Wasserstein GANs use the Wasserstein metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • GANs and VAEs can be combined (VAE-GAN)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Conditional GANs work akin[^similar] to continual VAEs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Generative models today

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      18. Reinforcement learning

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Reinforcement learning idea

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      idea: agent interacting with environment providing rewards
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      goal: learn policy to maximize reward

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Idea

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Inspired by research on psychology and animal learning

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Idea: problems involving an agent interacting with an environment, which provides numeric reward signals

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Goal: learn how to take actions in order to maximize reward

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Agent can

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Take actions that affect the state of the environment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Observe occasional rewards that depend on the state

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Goal: learn a policy to maximize expected reward over time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Atari games

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Objective: complete the game with the highest score
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • State: raw pixel inputs of the game state
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Action: game controls (e.g. left, right, up, down)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Reward: score increase/decrease at each time step

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Go

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Objective: win the game
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • State: positions of all pieces
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Action: where to put the next piece down
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Reward: 1 if win at the end of the game, 0 otherwise

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Markov Decision Process (MDP)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (S,A,R,P,y)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      transition P(s'|s,a) depends only on s

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Markov Decision Process

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Markov Decision process: mathematical framework that allows to make decisions on a stochastic environment
