                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Policy gradient methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      learn parametrized
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      π_θ directly

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Policy gradient methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • It can be more efficient to parameterize π and learn it directly

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Instead of: indirectly representing the policy using Q-values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Especially in large or continuous action spaces, where the Q-value function can be very complicated

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Example: a robot grasping an object has a very high-dimensional state

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Hard to learn exact value of every (state, action) pair

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      π_θ(s,a) ≈ P(a|s) gives probability distribution over actions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Stochastic policy representation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Stochastic policy: outputs a distribution of probability over different actions, given a certain state

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      πθ(s,a)≈P(a|s)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: learn function πθ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example – Policy gradient methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Example: policy gradient for pong game

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Idea: use a machine learning model that will learn a good policy from playing the game and receiving rewards

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      define trajectory τ of triplets s-a-r and mazimize cumulative reward through

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Objective function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Find: parameters θ to maximize the expected reward using GD

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Define: τ=(s0,a0,r0, s1,a1,r1,…) the entire trajectory associated to states-actions-rewards over time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: maximize the expected discounted cumulative reward

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective function

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        J(θ)=E[∑t≥0γtrt | πθ]=Eτ[r(τ)]=∫τr(τ)p(τ,θ)dτ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Integral, over all the possible trajectories, of the product of

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Reward associated to τ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Probability of τ under policy with parameter θ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        p(τ,θ)=∏t≥0πθ(st,at)P(st+1|st,at)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • No more a function of τ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      update parameters and policy to increase climbing tajectories

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SGA intuition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Stochastic Gradient Ascent: going up the hill means higher rewards
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Objective: change model parameters and thus the policy to increase the likelihood of climbing trajectories

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      find θ s.t. τ maximize
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the cumulative reward

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SGA optimization

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Gradient of objective function: expected value over the trajectory in function of the cumulative reward

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Reinforce
